overview: There is nothing more intimate between lovers than the man releasing inside the woman. Four stories of the most intimate moments between couples are presented, with one making their own home movies with an antique 8mm camera; a conservative gal begging a young man to fulfill her fantasy of being Eve in the garden of Eden to his Adam; a normally uninteresting bath that turns into a scorching love feast; and a couple finally making the decision to make babies.
title: Internal Love 5
